queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:questions` ( `question_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `localization` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `position` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`question_id`), KEY `localization` (`localization`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:question_descriptions` ( `question_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `question` text NOT NULL default '', `answer` text NOT NULL default '', `author` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `description` mediumtext, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`question_id`,`lang_code`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
